reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater vest fits true to size and is well-made, with one noting it's longer in the back.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very stylish black/white houndstooth sweater vest
items.body: Very nice sweater vest. Would consider it medium weight but not so heavy/thick that doesn’t allow it to be soft when wearing. Bought the black/white houndstooth in a medium and usually wear a medium but consider this a tad generous once worn over a top. It’s a “comfortable” fit and is long enough to partially cover the bum. Washed in cold water, put in dryer for a minute for wrinkles, then dried on a hanger. Perfect. Recommend! Read more
items.author: Brenda Edwards

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars ALMOST perfect.
items.body: Please read until the end. I had to edit this. I’m really enjoying wearing this and the versatility it gives me. It’s nicely constructed and soft. It fits true to size and is nice and long so doesn’t feel skimpy. I’m trying to restrain myself from buying one in every color! EDIT So, I did order three more and each one was a completely different size although all marked the size I ordered. So that’s four different sizes for four different orders. I can live with three of them but one is way too small for me. It’s as if the person stitching labels on just picked a random label from the box. See my attached photo. Both are supposed to be XL. I love this but know you’re either going to get lucky or not so save your packaging and don’t cut off the tags until you try it on. Read more
items.author: middleofnowhere

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So glad I purchased this!
items.body: The vest is well made. I love the “V” neck style and it is a medium weight, so not going to drag you down. Love the detail around the v-neck as well as the hemline being shorter in the front than in the back with side slits. While LARGE was my recommended size, I went down to a medium, because I didn’t want it to be too long or overwhelming on me. It was a good call! I love the fit! The color is an army/olive green color, not as bright green as shown. The wrinkles will drop out as you wear it! Very pleased with the quality of the product for the price I paid! Read more
items.author: Mother Bunny

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, but a bit too long in the back
items.body: Material is great, the knit is thick and I see no flaws, well sown. Color was amazing. The front length was great, but the back is so much longer than I expected. This also runs large, and while I wanted it to be a little big and not skin tight, I think sizing down one size would have been better. Might have helped the length problem as well. Overall, I would def purchase again but a size smaller than usual Read more
items.author: Amanda D.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made & beautiful vest
items.body: The vest material is quite thick, but very soft. It’s well made and the stitch pattern is intricate. It’s very attractive and will look fabulous with jeans. Read more
items.author: Janet K. Bick

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have fall piece
items.body: Fabulous fit. Great quality. Soft and cozy. It was the perfect business casual outfit and I got lots of compliments. Read more
items.author: Sharon

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars BEAUTIFUL SWEATER BUT DOES NOT COMPLIMENT PLUS SIZE WOMEN :(
items.body: The quality of this sweater is a 10/10. It's beautiful and soft. It's perfect for layering HOWEVER if you are a plus size person like myself - I would not recommend. It made me look boxy if that makes sense. This sweater was made for smaller body type. Although I absolutely loved the sweater - I had to return it! Read more
items.author: Deborah Harrell

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars fabric and fit are better than fine
items.body: My experience with Amazon clothing has generally been pretty bad. This sweater vest is a notable exception. The fabric is excellent and much thicker and more sturdy than I expected. It washes well and fits exactly as I hoped it would fit. My general rule with Amazon clothing is to go up a size. I did that with this shirt and it fit perfectly. The color is vibrant. There is plenty of space in the armholes. The length, which is quite long, was just right. I'm very happy with this purchase. Read more
items.author: poodleskirt

short_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.
long_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Color Block Beige, Cream, Army Green, Black, Camel, Navy Blue, Dark Apricot, Wine Red, Yellow, Houndstooth Black and White, Caramel, Color Block Navy, Color Block Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
